title: Game Design-Based Digital Literacy Enhancement Program

context.additional_context: Science career-linked education integrating the six domains of digital literacy (creation, management, publishing, communication, research, exploration) through game development projects using VR simulations in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners can create 3D game prototypes incorporating science content in VR environments.
Learners can complete collaborative work by applying information management and publishing skills when using digital tools.
Learners can demonstrate digital communication skills by exchanging feedback on online collaborative platforms.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
